text: penkar prahlad kæ mnusʹy hrux thi rea di hı wa hiy kæ chay khn hnung cak phwk khea hı teuxn sathab mnusʹy læa cæng khawdi kæ brrda phu sraththa wa thæcring sahrab phwk khea nan ca di rab tahænng xan sung n thi phracea khxng phwk khea brrda phu ptiseth sraththa klaw wa “thæcring ni khux nak mayakl xyang nænxn”
